list.name: Annotations & Alerts
list.query: SELECT hostname,ip FROM agent WHERE ip != '' AND ip !~ /127.0.0.1/

panels.description: Interfaces of targets on which agents are running

targets.query: SELECT hostname,interface,ip FROM "agent" WHERE ip != '' AND ip !~ /127.0.0.1/  ORDER BY time DESC

panels.title: Interfaces

targets.query: SELECT "hostname", "pid",  "raddr", "rport", "protocol","type" FROM "netconn" WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1000
SELECT "pid", "ppid", "user", "command" FROM "process" WHERE "hostname" = '$host' ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT "pid", "ppid", "user", "command" FROM "process" WHERE "hostname" = '$host' ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT hostname,ip,port,protocol,pid,type FROM "socket" WHERE  hostname = '$host'
SELECT hostname,ip,port,protocol,pid,type FROM "socket" WHERE  hostname = '$host'
SELECT "hostname", "pid",  "raddr", "rport", "protocol","type" FROM "netconn" WHERE "hostname" = '$host' AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT "hostname", "pid",  "raddr", "rport", "protocol","type" FROM "netconn" WHERE "hostname" = '$host' AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT "pid", "syscall", "arg0", "arg1", "arg2", "return" FROM "syscall" WHERE "hostname" = '$host' AND "syscall" = '$syscall' AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT "pid", "syscall", "arg0", "arg1", "arg2", "return" FROM "syscall" WHERE "hostname" = '$host' AND "syscall" = '$syscall' AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT SUM("return") FROM "syscall" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" = '$host' AND "syscall" =~ /send/ GROUP BY time($__interval),pid fill(null)
SELECT SUM("return") FROM "syscall" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" = '$host' AND "syscall" =~ /write/ GROUP BY time($__interval),pid fill(null)
SELECT SUM("return") FROM "syscall" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" = '$host' AND "syscall" =~ /send/ GROUP BY time($__interval),pid fill(null)
SELECT SUM("return") FROM "syscall" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" = '$host' AND "syscall" =~ /write/ GROUP BY time($__interval),pid fill(null)
SELECT SUM("return") FROM "syscall" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" = '$host' AND "syscall" =~ /recv/ GROUP BY time($__interval),pid fill(null)
SELECT SUM("return") FROM "syscall" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" = '$host' AND "syscall" =~ /read/ GROUP BY time($__interval),pid fill(null)
SELECT SUM("return") FROM "syscall" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" = '$host' AND "syscall" =~ /recv/ GROUP BY time($__interval),pid fill(null)
SELECT SUM("return") FROM "syscall" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" = '$host' AND "syscall" =~ /read/ GROUP BY time($__interval),pid fill(null)
SELECT "pid", "syscall", "arg0", "arg1", "arg2", "return" FROM "syscall" WHERE "hostname" = '$host' AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT "pid", "syscall", "arg0", "arg1", "arg2", "return" FROM "syscall" WHERE "hostname" = '$host' AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT pid,libcall,"arg0","arg1" FROM "$host" WHERE $timeFilter AND "type" = 'libcall' ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT pid,libcall,"arg0","arg1" FROM "$host" WHERE $timeFilter AND "type" = 'libcall' ORDER BY time DESC
